task.title: Allow members of external communities to contact you
task.shortdesc: If you have access to external server communities, members of those communities might need to grant you permission before you can add them to your contact list. You might also need to grant permission to them before they can add you to their contact lists. After permission is granted, your status displays for them and you can chat with each other.

context.note: Privacy lists are available only to users of HCL Sametime Connect Version 8.0 and later software.

entry.p: Click Actions and preferences Preferences. Then, click Privacy in the navigator.
Click Actions and preferences Preferences. Then, expand the Sametime section in the navigator and click Privacy.

step.cmd: If it is available to you, click the External Contacts tab.
For The following external contacts are not allowed to see your online status, begin typing the name of the person you want to add and then select the name from the list of matches that displays.
